questionData.explanation_of_Question: 這題考驗學生使用連接詞 'because' 來表達因果關係。後面的句子 (He had been working all day.) 是前面句子 (He was extremely tired.) 的原因。使用 'because' 連接時，because 子句可以放在主句之後。
questionData.instruction: 請使用 'because' 將這兩個句子合併成一個句子。
questionData.sentence_b: He had been working all day.
standard_answers: He was extremely tired because he had been working all day.

questionData.combining_method: 限定相對子句 (Defining relative clause - who)
questionData.explanation_of_Question: 這題考驗學生使用關係代名詞 'who' 來引導一個限定相對子句，修飾先行詞 'the woman'。相對子句 'who is wearing a red dress' 提供了識別 'the woman' 所需的資訊。
questionData.instruction: 請使用 'who' 將這兩個句子合併成一個句子。
questionData.sentence_b: The woman is wearing a red dress.
standard_answers: The woman who is wearing a red dress is my cousin.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 這題考驗學生使用對等連接詞 'but' 來連接兩個表達對比或轉折的獨立子句。第一個句子 'She studied hard' 表示努力，而第二個句子 'she didn't pass the exam' 表示結果不如預期，兩者之間存在對比。
questionData.instruction: 請使用 'but' 將這兩個句子合併成一個句子。
standard_answers: She studied hard, but she didn't pass the exam.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 這題考驗學生使用時間連接詞 'while' 來連接兩個同時發生的動作。'While' 引導的子句通常描述較長或背景性的動作，而主句描述在同時間發生的另一個動作。
questionData.instruction: 請使用 'while' 將這兩個句子合併成一個句子。
questionData.sentence_b: My brother was playing video games.
standard_answers: While I was reading a book, my brother was playing video games.
My brother was playing video games while I was reading a book.

questionData.combining_method: 分詞構句 (Participial phrase - present participle)
questionData.explanation_of_Question: 這題考驗學生使用現在分詞構句來簡化句子，表達一個與主句動作同時發生或描述主語狀態的動作。原始句中 'She smiled' 是主句，'She waved goodbye' 是另一個動作。將其中一個動詞轉換為現在分詞 'waving' 形成分詞構句 'waving goodbye'，可以修飾主語 'She' 或表示同時動作。
questionData.instruction: 請將這兩個句子合併成一個使用分詞構句的句子。
